body: I'm coming in from the go side, not the RE2 side, so I'm not as familiar with RE2 (though I did take a look). I'm not sure if the Space property is equivalent to the Zs character class. Perhaps it's redundant, and I didn't realize it? Apparantly neither the "Space" property nor Zs are the whitespace absolutely everyone agrees on outside the unicode consortium, since they don't include newlines or tabs.
